attributes.action: Make Criminals Join The Army And Serve In War Zones During Their Sentence!
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Relieve the burden on the state by making criminals serve their sentence constructively by joining the Army and serving in war zones, this will eleviate the strain on our prison space and tax payers, and provide a more contructive way to repay their dept to society, whilst easing the current pressure on our Armed Forces.
